description: Perfectly light and crunchy, it's as easy as opening a bag - minus the guilt.
name: Air Fryer Potato Crisps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut potatoes into thin slices using a mandolin slicer or a sharp knife. Place potatoes into a bowl with cold water and soak them for at least 20 minutes.
Thoroughly dry the potato slices and season with oil and salt. Arrange the slices in the fryer basket in two layers.
Cook for 20 minutes at 100°C/80°C fan-forced. Toss the potato crisps and turn up the heat to 200°C. Cook for an additional 5 minutes or until golden brown and crispy.
